SEARCH

All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
AmbientLight
Represents the ambient light in a scene, which illuminates all objects equally regardless of their position or orientation.
Camera
Represents a camera in a 3D space.
Camera.Builder
Inner Builder class for constructing Camera objects.
CameraIntegrationTests
Integration tests for Camera with various geometries.
Color
Wrapper class for java.jwt.Color The constructors operate with any non-negative RGB values.
Cylinder
The Cylinder class represents a cylinder in a 3D Cartesian coordinate system.
DirectionalLight
Represents a directional light source in a scene, which illuminates all objects uniformly from a specified direction.
Double3
This class will serve all primitive classes based on three numbers
Geometries
Represents a collection of geometrical objects that can be intersected by a ray.
GeometriesTest
Unit tests for the Geometries class.
Geometry
Abstract class representing geometric shapes in a 3D space.
ImageWriter
Image writer class combines accumulation of pixel color matrix and finally producing a non-optimized jpeg image from this matrix.
Intersectable
Interface representing an intersectable geometry in 3D space.
Intersectable.GeoPoint
 
Light
Represents a generic light source.
LightSource
Represents a light source in a scene.
LightsTests
Test rendering a basic image
Main
Test program for the 1st stage
Material
Represents the material properties of an object, including diffuse and specular coefficients, and shininess for specular highlights.
Plane
Plane class represents a plane in a 3D Cartesian coordinate system.
Point
Class representing a point in three-dimensional space.
PointLight
Represents a point light source in a scene, which emits light equally in all directions from a specific point.
Polygon
Polygon class represents a two-dimensional polygon in a 3D Cartesian coordinate system.
PolygonTests
Testing Polygons This class contains unit tests for the Polygon class.
RadialGeometry
Class representing radial geometry in three-dimensional space.
Ray
Class representing a ray in three-dimensional space.
RayTracerBase
Abstract base class for a ray tracer.
RenderTests
Test rendering a basic image
Scene
Represents a 3D scene containing geometries, background color, ambient light, and other settings.
SceneBuilderFromXml
SceneBuilderFromXml class responsible for constructing a Scene object from an XML file.
SimpleRayTracer
A simple implementation of a ray tracer.
Sphere
Class representing a sphere in three-dimensional space.
SpotLight
Represents a spot light source in a scene, which emits light in a specific direction from a point.
Triangle
The Triangle class represents a triangle in 3D space.
Tube
Class representing a tube in three-dimensional space.
Util
Util class is used for some internal utilities, e.g. controlling accuracy.
Vector
Class representing a vector in three-dimensional space, inheriting from Point.
